about_the_game:
STORY:

Elena has always shared a strong bond with her best friend, Lisa. However, one day, she uncovers a terrifying secret about Lisa’s boyfriend, Jason: he is a dark and abusive figure who manipulates and torments Lisa, both psychologically and physically. Learning the truth, Elena acts on her protective instincts and kills Jason to save Lisa. But this act is not the end—it marks the beginning of a dark curse.

Shortly after Jason’s death, strange and sinister events begin to unfold. Jason’s body does not find peace in the grave; instead, it is possessed by a malevolent force. A mysterious power resurrects him, transforming him into a terrifying mutant creature known as Dark Shadow. This entity, a blend of Jason’s rage and a dark, vengeful spirit, is fueled by one purpose: to destroy Elena and Lisa’s lives in his quest for vengeance.

Consumed by guilt and fear, Elena quickly realizes that Jason’s dark presence is always lurking, waiting for the right moment to strike. As Dark Shadow relentlessly hunts her, Elena is forced to confront not only the monstrous creature but also her own fears and guilt. Exploring abandoned houses, eerie forests, and desolate streets, Elena embarks on a perilous journey to protect Lisa and herself, uncovering sinister secrets along the way.

MICROPHONE SYSTEM

Don’t let fear take over! Dark Shadow hears every scream and punishes you for it. If you lose control and scream, the game restarts.

  • You must stay silent: Control every breath, because one scream can end it all.

  • A unique experience: Feel the fear in your bones with your microphone and headset.

  • Play in the dark: Stay alone and discover the power of silence.

FEATURES:

  • Engaging Gameplay: Dive into an immersive story with a 2-hour playtime.

  • Multiple Endings: Your choices lead to one of two unique conclusions.

  • Microphone Input: Interact with the environment and trigger events using your microphone.

  • Dynamic Sound Detection: The game reacts to your real-world sounds, intensifying the horror experience.

  • Survival Horror: Navigate through dark, eerie locations and face the terrifying Dark Shadow.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: A chilling atmosphere with tense moments that challenge your courage.

  • Immersive Sound Design: Enhance your experience with high-quality sound effects and music.

  • Story-driven Gameplay: Uncover the dark secrets behind Jason’s transformation and Elena’s struggle for survival.

  • Stunning Graphics: Immerse yourself in a visually breathtaking world with high-quality graphics, detailed environments, and realistic character models, bringing the eerie atmosphere to life.

Note: This game was created with passion and dedication by a solo developer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Elena killed Jason to protect her friend, but unleashed a horrifying curse. Now Jason has returned as a monstrous creature, Dark Shadow, seeking revenge. Survive, face your fears, and uncover dark secrets. "Dark Shadows" is a chilling horror experience that will test your courage!
